title: They said this doesn't work ü§£ Hacking networks with VLAN hopping and Python
description:
Don't believe what you read online. VLAN hopping is possible and I'm going to show you how :)  I'll also show you have to mitigate these types of attacks.

Boson Bombal 8 Weeks to CCNA: https://davidbombal.wiki/bosonbombal

// MENU //
00:00 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Messing With The Network
00:51 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Intro to VLAN Hopping
01:20 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  VLAN Test Setup
2:35 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Starting Wireshark Captures//Filtering for ICMP
3:30 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Python Script Explained
4:13 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Windows 11 Network Setup
4:52 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  VLAN Configuration Diagram
5:02 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Python Script Explained Continued
5:17 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Test 01 - Running the script in Kali Linux
5:51 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Examining ICMP Packets in Wireshark
6:46 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Examining Network Setup with PuTTY
8:29 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Why the script doesn't work
8:44 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Test 02 - One More Time
9:30 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  How to make it work
10:21 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Test 03 - Running the modified script
10:40 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  The Trick Step by Step
11:31 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Test 04 - I'll Do That Again
12:46 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Test 05 - Let's Try That Again
15:44 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  How To Mitigate VLAN Hopping
17:26 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Test 06 - After Implementing Mitigation
18:09 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Don't Use VLAN 1
18:22 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Changing the Native VLAN
19:22 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Test 07 - After Changing Native VLAN
19:45 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Test 08 - After Changing Native VLAN
19:58 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Again, Don't Use VLAN 1!
21:00 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Looking At The Modified Python Script  
21:55 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Changing the Python Script to Target New VLAN Config 
23:04 ‚ñ∂Ô∏è  Stacking Multiple Packets

// TAP used //
Dualcomm ETAP-2003 10/100/1000Base-T TAP :https://amzn.to/3we7mGI

// Script //
Github: https://github.com/davidbombal/scapy/blob/main/vlan-hopping.py

// Previous videos //
Previous video: https://youtu.be/CIWD9fYmDig
Playlist: https://davidbombal.wiki/scapy

// SCAPY RESOURCES //
Website: https://scapy.net/
Documentation: https://scapy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

// SCAPY INSTALLATION //
sudo apt update
sudo apt install python3-pip
sudo pip3 install scapy

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/davidbombal

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/davidbombal
